men and women who have completed their studies, esp. at a college or university: a reunion of Yale alumni of the class of 1990 Vassar alumni Note: Alumni can be used to refer to men only, and in that case alumnae is used to refer to women only, but more often alumni is used to refer to either or both sexes where both attend the same school. The singular forms are alumnus for a man, and alumna for a woman.
